channel.title: Azureiaas on WRISH
channel.description: Recent content in Azureiaas on WRISH

item.title: Download file the Powershell way
item.description: I was building a lab in Azure today and needed to download the Exchange binaries to extend my test AD schema. When you open up IE and browse to the Microsoft download site you have to add a list of 10 or 15 different sites to trusted - some of them are CDNs for shared Javascript code and resources. https://cdn.optimizely.com https://c.s-microsoft.com https://query.prod.cms.rt.microsoft.com https://mem.gfx.ms and then… Your current security settings do not allow this file to be downloaded sigh!
